interface.name: SignedInfo
interface.javadoc: Returns the canonicalization method of this SignedInfo. the canonicalization method
Returns the signature method of this SignedInfo. the signature method

Returns an {@link java.util.Collections#unmodifiableListunmodifiable list} of one or more {@link Reference}s.
an unmodifiable list of one or more {@link Reference}s
Returns the optional Id attribute of this SignedInfo. the id (may be null if not specified)

Returns the canonicalized signed info bytes after a signing or validation operation. This method is useful for debugging. an InputStream containing the canonicalized bytes, or null if this SignedInfo has not been signed or validated yet
